jobDescription: As an Analyst in the Consulting team, you will build and maintain positive relationships with teams and clients, exceeding expectations. Responsibilities include managing workstreams, developing solutions using full-stack engineering, identifying and resolving risks, improving processes, building sector knowledge, and applying awareness of global trends to client needs.
requiredSkills: Documentation (requirements, system design, use cases, test plans, training manuals)
preferredQualifications: DevOps tools and practices (CI/CD, Docker, infrastructure as code)
